data.title: Bruce Willis: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Bruce Willis: Check out the list of all Bruce Willis movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Bruce Willis news on Times of India.
data.text:
Demi Moore shares emotional birthday wish for daughter Rumer

IANS / Aug 17, 2024, 11:58 (IST)

Hollywood actress Demi Moore shared a heartfelt birthday wish for her daughter Rumer on Instagram. She posted two pictures, one of Rumer as a newborn and another recent image, along with a loving message. Rumer is one of Moore's three daughters with ex-husband Bruce Willis. Moore and Willis have maintained a close relationship despite their 2000 divorce.

Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively make history as the first married couple to top the US box office in 34 years

etimes.in / Aug 12, 2024, 08:41 (IST)

Reynolds and Lively have actively supported each other's projects, showcasing their strong partnership. Reynolds shared a humorous video featuring himself interviewing It Ends With Us co-star Brandon Sklenar, highlighting their playful dynamic. This collaboration has not only generated buzz for their films but has also reinforced their status as a Hollywood power couple.

Cameron Diaz addresses inclusion in Jeffrey Epstein documents, denies any association

etimes.in / Jan 06, 2024, 12:47 (IST)

In a statement provided to Page Six on Friday, Cameron Diaz's publicist categorically denied any connection between the actress and Jeffrey Epstein. The statement emphasized that Cameron never met Epstein, was never in the same place as him, and had no association with him whatsoever. The denial comes in the wake of claims made by one of Epstein's accusers, Joanna Sjoberg, in a deposition included in the documents

Sriram Raghavan on 'Merry Christmas'-Pinocchio connection: It's a story of deception

PTI / Jan 03, 2024, 12:45 (IST)

Director Sriram Raghavan's upcoming thriller film 'Merry Christmas' starring Katrina Kaif and Vijay Sethupathi is set in the early '80s and shares a thematic connection with the story of 'Pinocchio'. The film's trailer, which serves as a time capsule, takes viewers back to the era of weighing machines, landline phones, and single-screen theatres. Raghavan decided to include these elements as they are all gone now. 'Merry Christmas' is an intimate story of two mysterious strangers and is shot simultaneously in Hindi and Tamil. The oddball pairing of Kaif and Sethupathi adds to the curiosity surrounding the film.

Bruce Willis' family has more bad days than good amid dementia battle

IANS / Dec 08, 2023, 12:27 (IST)

Bruce Willis' family is spending time with him due to his frontotemporal dementia. The disease causes personality, behavior, and language deterioration. Bruce's family is providing around-the-clock care. Rumer Willis wants her daughter Louetta to have a special bond with her grandfather. Bruce's diagnosis brought the family closer together.

Suki Waterhouse to Melissa Barrera: TOP Hollywood Instagram posts of the week

etimes.in / Nov 25, 2023, 10:03 (IST)

As the week unfolds, these Instagram moments have not only captivated the attention of fans worldwide but also provided a peek into the multifaceted lives of Hollywood's brightest stars. From the joy of impending parenthood to the challenges of unexpected career turns, and the celebration of family bonds, this week's Instagram stories have painted a diverse and dynamic picture of the entertainment industry. Stay tuned as Hollywood continues to unfold its stories, one Instagram post at a time.

Bruce Willis' wife says she's 'not good' amid his dementia battle

IANS / Aug 15, 2023, 15:43 (IST)

Emma Heming, the wife of dementia-stricken actor Bruce Willis, has admitted she is "not good" as she continues to support her husband. The 45-year-old model, who has two daughters with the Die Hard actor, made the confession in an update to her social media fans. She urged fellow "care partners" to "look for something beautiful" in their otherwise "hard", "stressful" days and send her photos of their lives. Heming has to make a "conscious effort" every day to live the best life she can "for myself, for our two children and for Bruce," she said.

Bruce Willis' daughter Tallulah Willis is finally able to deal with and support her father through his dementia

etimes.in / Jun 02, 2023, 19:01 (IST)

In a recent feature for Vogue, Tallulah Willis, the daughter of Bruce Willis discussed a variety of topics, including her connection with her father, his dementia, and her own mental health problems. The 29-year-old daughter of the Die Hard actor, and his ex-wife Demi Moore did not have an easy childhood.
